features: Broom head clicks into place at different angles with a tap of your foot
Great for ergonomic sweeping, accessing tight spaces and reaching into ceiling corners
Lightweight, aluminum pole for easy sweeping and maneuvering
Feathered tip bristles ideal for grabbing dust and dirt
body.description: OXO Good Grips Any-Angle BroomWhether you need to reach beside the fridge or in the corner, the OXO Good Grips Any-Angle Broom can meet your needs. The Broom head clicks into place at different angles with a push of your foot and stays in place while you’re sweeping. The aluminum pole is lightweight for easy maneuvering, and also makes it perfect for reaching ceiling corners. The soft, rounded handle allows for a secure and comfortable grip while cleaning at any angle. The flexible bristles have feathered tips to effectively capture dust and dirt, without flicking back and spreading the mess.It’s the Little ThingsAt OXO, we consistently develop products that address even the tiniest of pet peeves, because we know it’s the little things that make the biggest difference. During user testing, we discovered that people use their brooms for more than just floors. With that in mind, we developed a broom made of lightweight aluminum, for maximum maneuverability - up, down, and all around.Features & Benefits:Adjustable: Broom head clicks into place at different angles and stays in place while sweepingAccess tight spaces: Great for ergonomic sweeping and reaching into ceiling cornersManeuverable: Lightweight aluminum pole for easy sweeping and maneuveringEfficient: Feathered tip bristles ideal for grabbing dust and dirtComfort: Soft, comfortable, non-slip gripGood TipTo keep your Broom in tip-top shape, store it by hanging it from the hanging hole, keeping the bristles off the ground. This will help the bristles keep their form, and will keep your broom cleaner when not in use.OXO is dedicated to providing innovative consumer products that make everyday living easier.How do we do it?We study people – lefties and righties, male and female, young and old – interacting with products and identify ways to make them better. Our “question everything” process and relentless attention to detail uncover the best solutions for slicing, peeling, whisking, baking, stirring, washing, scrubbing, dusting, storing and organizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OXO = Superior Quality
reviews.reviewText: OXO always has excellent quality and this simple broom is no different. From the grip to the bristles, I've used this broom for a year now and it has lasted through consistent weekly use. Not only does it have great quality, but it's light weight, sturdy, and is thin enough to store any where. I usually need to plan to take out the broom to clean but have stopped thinking about cleaning and just take this out since it's easy to use and clean. Overall, OXO is a hidden gem of a company that makes some of the best household products I've used and the broom should only be the start of building out your set of cleaning tools.Overall: 5/5Recommendation: Buy it as this is the only broom you need and is as ideal of a product as it gets.Pros:- Light weight- Easy to use / Flexible head- Great quality rod, grip, and bristles- Does not wear easily even after a year- OXO has great products and all at a great priceCons: None

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: The time came to replace a much liked, and well used Michael Graves designed broom. We bought a cheapish one to use during a move and it was awful. Having used and appreciated OXO products, this was an easy choice. As it turns out, it is lightweight and maneuverable. We have a tough problem. We live right on a beach and sand gets everywhere. The bristles of the OXO broom are fine enough to catch the fine sand but not so stiff that they fling the grains around at the end of the stroke. The adjustable angle on the broom handle makes it easy to get under cabinets to get fine crumbs and dust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely High Quality Broom
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to be irked to spend this amount of money for a simple indoor home broom, but once you try this one out, you'll probably feel that it's worth the price. This is a high quality metal and plastic design (the broom stick itself is aluminum, and the head components plastic) that provides a very solid feel. The broom head is mounted on an adjustable angle pivot point so you can adjust the broom head to straight or angled position, and the angle you select is securely held in place by a ratcheting system, and it won't click out of place when you are using the broom. The bristles are a medium thickness with good feathering at the tip for excellent dust pickup for most normal indoor uses. I would not hesitate the recommend it, and it seems like the piece is well enough constructed to have a good service life. Five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars O I Broom
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves the adjustable head on this broom. A repeat purchase because we like it so much. One for the house and one for the garage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not to shabby.
reviews.reviewText: The broom is made of good materials; just what I'd expect from OXO. The bristles pick everything up just fine and the handle is light and just the right height. The bristles have a lot of spring in them though and that is why I went with 4 stars instead of 5. It is rather annoying to have your dirt go flying across the room.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lo mejor de lo mejor
reviews.reviewText: Está escoba es perfecta para pisos ultra pulidos pues sus cerdas son muy suaves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love My Broom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I use this to sweep the kitchen floor most mornings after my wife has cooked the previous night. Really perfect for kitchen cleanup as the bristles are thin and densely packed on the broom head so even small particles of food are swept up. Lightweight aluminum handle, maybe a little bit shorter than it could be, but overall very nice to use. I hung it on the backside of the pantry door to keep the bristles straight. Nice broom.
Merveilleux pas de mot assez bien ...c'est une merveille ..me voilà avec deux ....et peu etre plus j'en parle à mes amies ami..

Ich suchte einen simplen Stubenbesen, für zwischendurch --wenn kleiner Besen & Schaufel zu wenigund der Staubsauger, der ja auch hervorgeholt werden muss, zu viel ist.Ich stellte fest: So einfach ist das heutzutage gar nicht mehr, es gibt x verschiedene Sorten Besen,und die tradierten Stubenbesen sind -- nach Kundenbewertungen zu urteilen --nicht unbedingt gut und/oder das, was sie einmal waren.Kurz: Ich musste lang herumschauen, lesen, überlegen und verfiel auf diesenund habe den Kauf nicht bereut. Trotz des horrenden Preises.Er fegt gründlich, wirkt stabil und ist wendig,aber nicht zu klein, um auch mal zwischendurch die ganze Küche und den ganzen Flur zu fegen.Empfehlung.
Una escoba estupenda válida para todo tipo de suelos. Una gozada que se adapte a sitios pequeños. Volveré a comprar productos de la marca Oxo
Déçue par ce balai, les poils synthétiques gardent la saleté il faut tout le temps nettoyer les poils. Pas du tout pratique, je déconseille, mieux vaut prendre un balai normal moins cher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 22, 2014
reviews.reviewText: Another top quality product from the Good Grips range. Probably worth clarifying that the way the angle is set is a clicker wheel onto which the broom head is attached. Thought it was going to be a 45deg or 90deg type affair. Actually allows the angle to be varied in something like 10 degree variations, meaning I can't think of an agle you'd ever need that you'd ever want. Perfectly satisfied.
